title: Signal strength and bad call quality. Drop call.
content:
Got a Pixel 3 (non-XL). I love everything about it, except the signal strength and call quality are terrible. I'm constantly getting dropped calls or, when the call doesn't drop, the person on the other end consistently asks me to repeat myself since my voice breaks up. 

Wife got same phone and cell phone provider and don't have any issues.

So far, I've tried rebooting into safe mode and resetting network settings, as well as reseating my SIM card -
